.sf-product-image{transform:scale(1.1)}.sf-product-title{margin-bottom:5px;color:#000;word-wrap:break-word;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:1;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;line-height:1.5}.sf-price-container{line-height:1.5}.sf-product-price{color:#000;margin-bottom:5px}.sf-product-offer-price{color:red;margin-bottom:10px}.sf-add-to-cart-btn{display:flex;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:14px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px 1s ease-in-out}.sf-out-of-stock{display:none;align-items:center;border:none;background:#000;font-size:14px;width:100%;min-height:32px;outline:0;padding:8px
